type.description: Property. NGSI Entity Type: It has to be ArrivalEstimation

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

hasStop.description: Relationship. It shall point to an Entity of Type GtfsStop

remainingTime.description: Property. It shall contain the remaining time of arrival for the trip heading to the concerned stop. Remaining time shall be encoded as a ISO8601 duration. Ex. `PT8M5S`.

remainingDistance.description: Property. It shall contain the remaining distance (in meters) of arrival for the trip heading to the concerned stop. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'Meters'

headSign.description: Property. It shall contain the text that appears on a sign that identifies the trip's destination to passengers. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'.
